A monument of mortalitie vpon the death and funerals, of the gracious prince, Lodovick, late Duke of Richmond and Lenox: Earle of New-castle, and Darnley, &c. ... By Iames Cleland Doctor in Diuinitie and domestick chaplaine to his Grace. Cleland, James, d. 1627.
[8], 56 p.
Printed by William Stansby for Ralph Rounthwaite, London : 1624.
With an additional title page, engraved. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 56 p.
Printed by William Stansby for Ralph Rounthwaite, London : 1624.
With an additional title page, engraved. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
